AROMA_REMATCH_MSG:
̂... I think he wants to settle this with you once and for all.
ā
He didn't even lay a finger on me... I guess I'm not worthy enough for him.
AROMA_MSG_001:
̂Let's try using the Planet Seed one more time to free
Lenate of her duties. Trust me, this time... it will work.
NPC_RENATE_010: ̄She was once Anses's main partner. Now she's the overseer of the underground Resistance lab for Anses clones.
NPC_AROMA_REC: ̄A girl that was impersonating Lucia. She is a rather intelligent, beautiful, young apprentice scientist.
NPC_GARUBIRUSU_REC: ̄A monster created from the remnants of Carmasso's corruption, and concentrated dark matter.
NPC_DARTHGARUMA_REC: ̄A monster created from the resurrected Dark Master, integrated with energy from dark matter.
NPC_DAGUJAGARUMA_REC: ̄The true form of Dark Master. Has a tremendous amount of dark matter energy within itself.
REC_POINT_SLEEP_020:
̄Survivor of mankind who became a human popsicle/was cryongenically preserved on his home planet and transferred here. ā
The original plan was for Mother to wake them after creating a new planet and help wth immigration.
REC_POINT_02_02: ̄Retrieved it from Jormungandros. It is not contaminated with any dark matter.
